content.text: Match ends, Almería 1, Real Valladolid 1.
Second Half ends, Almería 1, Real Valladolid 1.
Goal!  Almería 1, Real Valladolid 1. Javi Guerra (Real Valladolid) header from the centre of the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Mikel Balenziaga with a cross.
Foul by Jesús Rueda (Real Valladolid).
Henok Goitom (Almería) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Substitution, Almería. Verza replaces Aleix Vidal.

Corner,  Real Valladolid. Conceded by Esteban.

Corner,  Real Valladolid. Conceded by Michael Jakobsen.
